snippet.title: The Standing Stones for the Apple II
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

---


Game description:

"The Standing Stones" is a 3D dungeon-crawler RPG that takes place in a dungeon maze.

You fight monsters and other beings, loot gold and try to find your way out.


What I think:

Nice, but repetitive. And the controls could be better. 

CTRL and "direction key" to go through a door? Really?
